# Funktsioonid

```{r functions}
include_svg = function(path) {
  if (knitr::is_latex_output()) {
    output = xfun::with_ext(path, 'pdf')
    # you can compare the timestamp of pdf against svg to avoid conversion if necessary
    system2('rsvg-convert', c('-f', 'pdf', '-a', '-o', shQuote(c(output, path))))
  } else {
    output = path
  }
  knitr::include_graphics(output)
}

celsius_to_kelvin = function(celsius) {
  celsius + 2.7315e2
}

convertFromDegreesFToK <- function(temperatureF) {
  (temperatureF - 32) / 1.8 + ZERO_DEGREES_C_IN_K
}

changeSciNot <- function(n) {
  output <- format(n, scientific = TRUE) #Transforms the number into scientific notation even if small
  output <- sub("e", "\\\\times 10^", output) #Replace e with 10^
  output <- sub("\\+0?", "", output) #Remove + symbol and leading zeros on expoent, if > 1
  output <- sub("-0?", "-", output) #Leaves - symbol but removes leading zeros on expoent, if < 1
  output <- sub("(.*)", "\\$\\1\\$", output)
}
```


# Erisoojused

$$c_p(\mathrm{Cu, `r celsius_to_kelvin(25)` \times \mathrm(K)}) := 0.385 \times \frac{\mathrm{J}}{\mathrm{g} \times \mathrm{K}} = 3.85 \times 10^{2} \frac{\mathrm{J}}{\mathrm{kg} \times \mathrm{K}}$$ [@haynes_2014_crc, p. 4-124]

```{r cp_Cu}
cp_Cu = .385e3
```

$$c_p(\mathrm{Fe, `r celsius_to_kelvin(25)` \times \mathrm(K)}) := 0.449 \times \frac{\mathrm{J}}{\mathrm{g} \times \mathrm{K}} = 4.49 \times 10^{2} \frac{\mathrm{J}}{\mathrm{kg} \times \mathrm{K}}$$ [@haynes_2014_crc, p. 4-124]

```{r cp_Fe}
SPECIAL_HEAT_FE = .44 / (.1 ^ 3)
```

$$c_p(\mathrm{H_2O}) := 4.2194 \times \frac{\mathrm{kJ}}{\mathrm{kg} \times \mathrm{K}} = 4.2194 \times 10^{3} \frac{\mathrm{J}}{\mathrm{kg} \times \mathrm{K}}$$ [@haynes_2014_crc, p. 6-1]

```{r cp_H2O}
SPECIFIC_HEAT_CAPACITY_OF_WATER <- 4.18e3
```

$$c_p(teras) := 500 \times \frac{\mathrm{J}}{\mathrm{kg} \times \mathrm{K}} = 5 \times 10^2 \times \frac{\mathrm{J}}{\mathrm{kg} \times \mathrm{K}}$$ [@haynes_2014_crc, p. 12-211]

```{r cp_steel}
SPECIAL_HEAT_STEEL = 5e2
```

```{r alpha_fe}

```
